turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, what can i do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two small pizzas will be nice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first one I would like every type of cheese that they have just on the pizza and on the second one can I get a meat lover which would include beef, pork, and chicken?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On both the small pizza, I would like thin crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 2 small pizzas. Cheese pizza on the first. Meatlovers on the second. Thin crust on both, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. And how do I How do I know when it's ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at Bela Luna's in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, okay. No problem. That's fine. Yeah, let's order that, then.
